game.name: Unfair Ninja
game.description:
In this one of the best platform games for boys, you will surely get a chance to uncover a unique and interesting funny adventure story of a young Ninja. Since the boy is very little so he is pretty confused what to do survive a deadly training out in the woods. For this reason, he has chosen you to get through all the hurdles and find out the way to learn how to become a skilled Shadow Warrior. Are you ready to accept this challenge? Join Unfair Ninja and uncover the Secret Ninja scrolls!

The job is not as simple as it seems to be since there are many plenty of obstacles that are hidden and come to you suddenly. All you need is make a plan in advance before leaving your second step from the ground in this free online platform game. The quick Ninja sense will definitely help get through all the levels while avoiding being trapped. Come forward and fulfil your destiny to achieve the goal of the game! Just pay attention to details and apply your patience to overcome the obstacles!

Joining Ninja will take you to a journey full of death-defying tricks and unexpected surprises! All you need to have good senses to become a ninja. Put your ninja skills and senses to test to complete this training and help this cute boy to become a master of the shadow arts! It is up to you to guide Ninja while avoiding traps and spot the key that will help you move to the next level. Wishing you a good luck to clear all the levels of this unfair platformer game!
